name: molek-cbt
description: Offline CBT Examination System for Schools
author: dev by tbelzbby

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace backend && npm install --workspace frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev --workspace frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.package: npm run build && npx electron-builder@24.9.1 --win --x64 --config electron-builder.json
scripts.package:dir: npm run build && npx electron-builder@24.9.1 --win --x64 --dir --config electron-builder.json
